AccessSystem

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccessSystem.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Controller Class

    The Controller contains a list of both University and PersonRegister that is then used by the GUI.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(java.lang.String univesityName)
      Default Constructor: A new person register, sets the system as not active, the university name and a new Emergency logger.
